sentence.Network_en: You can enjoy a quick snack while your children cavort in the sand.
sentence.Network_cn: 趁孩子们在沙滩上嬉戏，你可以吃点小吃。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... caustic 腐蚀的>缓和的 cavort 腾跃>跋涉 cement 巩固物>破裂.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... cavern ? n. 大洞,洞窟 cavort ? vi. 欢跃 cede ? vt. 放弃.
新东方GRE词汇精选(2008版) - 豆丁网 ... cavity 洞，腔 cavort 腾越，欢跃 cede 割让，放弃.

list.abs: St. Paul cavorted to Christianity . He preached holy acrimony , which is another name for marriage ., 圣保罗欢闹了基督教 . 他传讲了圣恶毒 , 就是婚姻的另一个名字.

RelatedPhrase.word: And the chocolate cat goes cavorting around

list.key: And the chocolate cat goes cavorting around
list.exp: 与周围白色巧克力猫推移
list.abs: As her swelling proportions attest.她肿胀的程度证明.And the chocolate cat goes cavorting around与周围白色巧克力猫推移From this leafy limb unto that,从这叶肢琮表示,

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. (originally US): perhaps an alteration of curvet

entry.tran: 欢呼雀跃;欢腾;蹦蹦跳跳
entry.def: When people cavort, they leap about in a noisy and excited way.

example.ex: You can enjoy a quick snack while your children cavort in the sand...
example.tran: 趁孩子们在沙滩上嬉戏，你可以吃点小吃。

entry.def: Cavort is sometimes used by journalists to suggest that people were behaving in a playfully sexual way.

example.ex: It was claimed she cavorted with a police sergeant in a Jacuzzi but she denies this.
example.tran: 据称，她和一个巡佐在极可意浴缸里玩鸳鸯浴，但是她并不承认。

auth_sentence.content: He had a long schnoz and big Groucho eyebrows he could make caper and cavort to humorous effect.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had a long schnoz and big Groucho eyebrows he could make caper and cavort to humorous effect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had a long schnoz and big Groucho eyebrows he could make caper and cavort to humorous effect.

sentences.en: Satisfied, sun-warmed, we sprawl in the grass and watch our kites cavort.
sentences.cn: 阳光和煦，我们心满意足地趴在草丛里，看风筝在天上欢跃。
